section.title: Repeat on error until true
section.para: The next looping container will execute a group of actions only if one embedded action fails with error. In case of an error the loop will try again to execute all embedded actions. The on-error execution will take place until one of the following conditions evaluates to true:
1. Every embedded action was processes successfully
2. The ending condition evaluates to true

In the code example the error loop will continue four times as the <fail> action definitely will always fail. The time the condition "i=5" evaluates to true the loop will break anyway and the whole test case will fail.
